Getting a crash here on shutdown. Backtrace:

~~~
#0  __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
#1  0x00007ffff7574801 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:79
#2  0x00007ffff00d08b7 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6

#4  0x00007ffff00d6a41 in std::terminate() () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#5  0x00007ffff00d6c74 in __cxa_throw () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#6  0x00007ffff00d2769 in ?? () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6
#7  0x00007fffb9a98447 in std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_create (__old_capacity=0, this=<optimized out>, 
    __capacity=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.tcc:138
#8  std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU", 
    __end=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.tcc:219
#9  std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct_aux<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU", 
    __end=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.h:236
#10 std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::_M_construct<char*> (this=0x7fffab150a40, __beg=0x555557500a10 "P<PWUU", 
    __end=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.h:255
#11 std::__cxx11::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> >::basic_string (this=0x7fffab150a40, __str=
    <error reading variable: Cannot access memory at address 0x10>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.h:440

#13 0x00007fffb9ce9dfb in ignition::gazebo::v2::IgnRenderer::Destroy (this=0x555556d7b470) at /home/developer/ws/src/ign-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.cc:253

content.html:
Getting a crash here on shutdown. Backtrace:

#0  __GI_raise (sig=sig@entry=6) at ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/raise.c:51
#1  0x00007ffff7574801 in __GI_abort () at abort.c:79

    __capacity=<optimized out>) at /usr/bin/../lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/8/../../../../include/c++/8/bits/basic_string.tcc:138
